mapper.select: select distinct to_char(to_date(to_char(lent_date), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM') AS month from tbl_lent_book where lent_member_no = #{parameter} order by month desc

select case substr(lent_call_no, 1, 1) when '0' then '총류' when '1' then '철학' when '2' then '종교' when '3' then '사회과학' when '4' then '순수과학' when '5' then '기술과학' when '6' then '예술' when '7' then '언어' when '8' then '문학' when '9' then '역사' else '기타' end as category, count(*) as cnt from tbl_lent_book where lent_member_no = #{memberNo} and actual_return_date is not null and to_char(To_Date(lent_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} group by case substr(lent_call_no , 1, 1) when '0' then '총류' when '1' then '철학' when '2' then '종교' when '3' then '사회과학' when '4' then '순수과학' when '5' then '기술과학' when '6' then '예술' when '7' then '언어' when '8' then '문학' when '9' then '역사' else '기타' end order by category
